title: Jio is NOT giving free recharge worth ₹498; don’t fall for the FAKE WhatsApp forward | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the Coronavirus outbreak, a WhatsApp forward is making rounds, according to which telecom major Reliance Jio is giving free recharge worth ₹498 to all Indian users.

The same screenshot was shared on social media by several users.

ALSO READ: WHO warned against eating cabbage as Coronavirus remains the longest on…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above message and found it to be FAKE.

On visiting the link mentioned, it redirects the user to a page that asks for the name and ‘jio number’.

In the next step, it prompts the user to share the message to five people to receive the recharge.

NewsMobile would like to urge its readers that such websites are spam and its just a way to get user information and gain clicks on the website.

Moreover, Reliance Jio has NOT made any announcement regarding providing free recharge to its users. Hence, don’t fall for the FAKE WhatsApp forward.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
